derivation: from an unused root of uncertain signification;
outline:
Hattush = "assembled"
  1. a descendant of David, apparently one of the sons of Shechaniah, in the 4th or 5th generation from Zerubbabel
    1. a man who returned with Ezra; maybe same as 1 above
    2. a man who returned with Zerubbabel; maybe same as 1 above
  2. son of Hashabniah who helped repair the walls of Jerusalem with Nehemiah
strongs_def: Chattush, the name of four or five Israelites
